name: Lethal Pongbat
description:
Lethal Pongbat is a game inspired by the classic Mortal Pongbat game for Macintosh, but includes some new features as well.

PONG WITH LASERS

Each paddle is equipped with a powerful beam that can be used to shoot the opposing paddle to bits. Use the beam wisely as it needs time to recharge.

NOW YOU'RE PLAYING WITH POWER

Several power-ups are available through random spawning blocks. Hit a block with a ball to activate a power-up. Power-ups can have a variety of effects, including growing the beam or repairing damage of your paddle.

PLAY AGAINST CPU OR HUMANS

Play against a human or the computer, the choice is yours. Play against other humans behind the same computer or over a local area network.

GAMEPADS SUPPORTED

Just connect a gamepad and be ready to go.
